original_text:
“Pharaoh's chariots and his host he cast into the sea,
    and his chosen officers were sunk in the Red Sea.
korean_text: 그가 바로의 병거와 그의 군대를 바다에 던지시니 최고의 지휘관들이 홍해에 잠겼고

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh's chariots and his host he cast into the sea,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바로의 병거와 그의 군대를 바다에 던지시고,

sentences.original_text: and his chosen officers were sunk in the Red Sea.
